nodes.text: A law enforcement agency operated on the Inner Rim planet Trevura at some point between 0 BBY and 5 ABY.

The local law enforcement of Trevura was created for "Gun Nut," a roleplaying miniadventure for the Wizards of the Coast Star Wars Roleplaying Game written by Jeff Quick and published on Wizards.com on April 11, 2002.
